name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: By oath of those who establish proper ranks.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And by oath of those who herd with a stern warning.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And by oath of the groups that read the Qur’an.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed your God is surely only One.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them – and the Lord of the sun’s rising points.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We have indeed adorned the lowest heaven with stars as ornaments.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And to protect it from every rebellious devil.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They cannot listen to the speech of those on higher elevations and they are targeted from every side.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: To make them flee, and for them is a never-ending punishment.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except one who sometimes steals a part, so a blazing flame goes after him.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore ask them (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “Are they a stronger creation, or are other things of our creation, (the angels, the heavens etc.)?” We have indeed created them from sticky clay.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Rather you are surprised, whereas they keep mocking.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they do not understand, when explained to.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And whenever they see a sign, they mock at it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they say, “This is nothing but clear magic.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “When we are dead and have turned into dust and bones, will we certainly be raised again?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And also our forefathers?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Proclaim, “Yes, and with disgrace.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So that is just a single jolt, thereupon they will begin staring.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And will say, “O our misfortune!” It will be said to them, “This is the Day of Justice.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “This is the Day of Judgement, which you used to deny!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Gather all the unjust persons and their spouses, and all that they used to worship!” –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Instead of Allah – and herd them to the path leading to hell.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And stop them – they are to be questioned.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “What is the matter with you, that you do not help one another?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In fact this day they have all surrendered.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And some of them inclined towards others, mutually questioning.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “It is you who used to come to us from our right, in order to sway.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They will answer, “You yourselves did not have faith!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And we did not have any control over you; but in fact you yourselves were rebellious.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “So the Word of our Lord has proved true upon us; we will surely have to taste (the punishment).”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “We therefore led you astray, for we ourselves were astray!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So this day they all are partners in the punishment.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is how We deal with the guilty.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed, when it was said to them, “There is no God except Allah”, they were haughty.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they used to say, “Shall we forsake our Gods upon the sayings of a mad poet?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In fact he has brought the Truth, and testified for the Noble Messengers!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “You surely have to taste the painful punishment.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And you will not be compensated except for your deeds.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: For them is the sustenance known to Us.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Fruits; and they will be honoured.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In Gardens of peace.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Facing one another on thrones.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Cups of wine will be presented to them in rounds, from a spring flowing in front of them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: White, delicious for the drinkers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Neither does it intoxicate, nor give a headache.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And with them are those who do not set gaze upon men except their husbands, the maidens with gorgeous eyes.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: As if they were eggs, safely hidden.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So one among them turns to the other, questioning. –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The speaker among them said, “I had a companion.” –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Who used to tell me, ‘Do you believe it is true?’ –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: ‘That when we are dead and have turned into dust and bones, that we will either be rewarded or punished?’”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said (to others on the thrones), “Will you take a glimpse (into hell) below?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He therefore looked down and saw him amidst the blazing fire.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “By Allah, you had nearly ruined me!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And were it not for the munificence of my Lord, I too would have been seized and brought forth (captive)!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “So are we never to die?” (The people of Paradise will ask the angels, with delight, after the announcement of everlasting life.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Except our earlier death, and nor will we be punished?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “This is, most certainly, the supreme success.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: For such a reward should the workers perform.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So is this welcome better, or the tree of Zaqqum?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We have indeed made that a punishment for the unjust.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed it is a tree that sprouts from the base of hell.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Its fruit like the heads of demons.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So indeed they will eat from it, and fill their bellies with it.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then after it, indeed for them is the drink of boiling hot water.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then surely their return is towards hell.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They had indeed found their forefathers astray.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So they hastily follow their footsteps!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed before them, most of the former people went astray.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed We had sent Heralds of warnings among them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore see what sort of fate befell those who were warned!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed Nooh prayed to Us – so what an excellent Acceptor of Prayer We are!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We rescued him and his household from the great calamity.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We preserved his descendants.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Peace be upon Nooh, among the entire people.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is how We reward the virtuous.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We then drowned the others.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed Ibrahim is from his (Nooh’s) group.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When he came to his Lord, with a sound heart. (Free from falsehood).

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When he said to his father (paternal uncle) and his people, “What do you worship?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “What! You desire, through fabrication, Gods other than Allah?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “So what do you assume regarding the Lord Of The Creation?” (That He will not punish you?)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He then shot a glance at the stars.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He then said, “I feel sick (of you)!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they turned their backs on him and went away. (The pagans thought he would transmit the disease).

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He then sneaked upon their deities and said, “Do you not eat?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “What is the matter with you, that you do not say anything?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He then began striking them with his right hand, unseen by the people.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So the disbelievers came running towards him.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He said, “What! You worship what you yourselves have sculpted?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Whereas Allah has created you and your actions?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They said, “Construct a building (furnace) for him, and then cast him in the blazing fire!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So they tried to execute their evil scheme upon him – We therefore degraded them. (Allah saved him, by commanding the fire to turn cool).

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And he said, “Indeed I shall go to my Lord Who will guide me.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “My Lord! Give me a meritorious child.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We therefore gave him the glad tidings of an intelligent son.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And when he became capable of working with him, Ibrahim said, “O my son, I dreamt that I am sacrificing you – therefore now consider what is your opinion”; he said, “O my father! Do what you are commanded! Allah willing, you will soon find me patiently enduring!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then (remember) when they both submitted to Allah’s command, and Ibrahim lay his son facing downwards. (The knife did not hurt Ismail)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We called out to him, “O Ibrahim!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “You have indeed made the dream come true”; and this is how We reward the virtuous.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed this was a clear test.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We rescued him in exchange of a great sacrifice. (The sacrifice of Ibrahim and Ismail – peace be upon them – is commemorated every year on 10, 11 and 12 Zil Haj).

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Peace be upon Ibrahim!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is how We reward the virtuous.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We gave him the glad tidings of Ishaq, a Herald of the Hidden, from among those who deserve Our proximity.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We sent blessings upon him and Ishaq; and among their descendants – some who do good deeds, and some who clearly wrong themselves.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We indeed did a great favour to Moosa and Haroon.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And rescued them and their people from the great calamity.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We helped them, so they were victorious.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We bestowed the clear Book to both of them.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And guided them to the Straight Path.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We kept their praise among the latter generations.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Peace be upon Moosa and Haroon!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is how We reward the virtuous.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Indeed they are two of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed Ilyas is one of the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When he said to his people, “Do you not fear?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “What! You worship Baal (an idol) and leave the Best Creator?” –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Allah – Who is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: In response they denied him, so they will surely be brought forth as captives.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We kept his praise among the latter generations.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Peace be upon Ilyas!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: This is how We reward the virtuous.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He is indeed one of Our high ranking, firmly believing bondmen.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed Lut is one of the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When We rescued him and his entire household.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except an old woman, who became of those who stayed behind.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We then destroyed the others.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed you pass over them in the morning. –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And during the night; so do you not have sense?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed Yunus is one of the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: When he left towards the laden ship.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Then lots were drawn and he became of those who were pushed into the sea.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: The fish then swallowed him and he blamed himself. (For not waiting for Allah’s command.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And were he not one of those who praise. –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: He would have remained in its belly till the day when all will be raised.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: We then put him ashore on a plain, and he was sick.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We grew a tree of gourd (as a shelter) above him.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And We sent him towards a hundred thousand people, in fact more.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So they accepted faith – We therefore gave them usage for a while.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore ask them (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), whether the daughters are for your Lord and the sons for them!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Or that have We created the angels as females, while they were present?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Pay heed! It is their slander that they say. –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: That “Allah has offspring”; and indeed, surely, they are liars.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Has he chosen daughters instead of sons?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “What is the matter with you? What sort of a judgement you impose!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “So do you not ponder?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Or do you have some clear proof?”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “Then bring forth your Book, if you are truthful!”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And they have appointed a relationship between Him and the jinns; and indeed the jinns surely know that they will be brought forth.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Purity is to Allah from the matters they fabricate.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore you and all what you worship. (The disbelievers and their deities.)

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: You cannot make anyone rebel against Him.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Except the one who will go into the blazing fire.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And the angels say, “Each one of us has an appointed known position.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And indeed we, with our wings spread, await the command.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “And indeed we are those who say His purity.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed the disbelievers used to say, –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “If we had some advice from the earlier generations,” –

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: “We would certainly be the chosen bondmen of Allah.”

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: They therefore denied it, so they will soon come to know.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And indeed Our Word has already gone forth for Our bondmen who were sent.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: That undoubtedly, only they will be helped.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And surely, only Our army will be victorious.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Therefore turn away from them for some time.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And watch them, for they will soon see.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So are they being impatient for Our punishment?

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: So when it does descend in their courtyards – so what an evil morning it will be for those who were warned!

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And turn away from them for some time.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And wait, for they will soon see.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: Purity is to your Lord, the Lord of Honour, from all what they say.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And peace is upon the Noble Messengers.

name: Ahmed Raza Khan
text: And all praise is to Allah, the Lord Of The Creation.
